metadata.dc:author: Anzures López, B
Pérez Fernández, C J
metadata.dc:description: This paper includes the chief considerations about the community work in the Integral General Medicine Program Called Plan A36. General considerations are made abour the four years of trainign program in which the medical student in exposed to be in close contac with the most common medical and health problems in his country, and during this period of time, he becomes capable to develop all the techniques to act as a primary contac physicain.
metadata.dc:title: La comunidad en la educación médica en el programa de medicina general integral.
[Community in medical education programs of integral general medicine].
metadata.dc:publisher: Boletin medico del Hospital Infantil de Mexico
